message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit more
I'll offer you a bit less this time, considering inflation.  But I think it's still a fair deal.
Inflation is hitting hard, I need a bigger share
I'm willing to give you a larger share to avoid further losses from inflation.  Let's settle this now.
Inflation is getting out of hand, I need a bigger share to make up for it
Inflation is a major problem, but I'm still willing to offer you a decent amount. Let's make a deal before it's too late.
We're running out of time, I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile
We are down to the wire. I'm offering you a smaller share, but it's better than nothing. Let's reach an agreement before the money is worthless.
Last chance, I'm willing to take a risk to get a better deal
This is our last chance.  I'm willing to take almost everything to avoid losing it all.  It's better than nothing.
